text: When viewing either Connector objects or ThreadPool objects via JMX the name of the executor is not shown. It would be helpful if this were exposed via JMX so the links between Connectors/ThreadPools and Executors could be determined.
creator: markt@apache.org

text: Fix version. Sorry for the noise.
creator: markt@apache.org
markt@apache.org
text:
Fixed in trunk  and will be included in 7.0.3 onwards.

Proposed for 6.0.x.
